projects.name: Stock Performance
projects.description: Stock performance is a web application to check out performance by company to see which one performs the best, based on an external API provided by Financial Modeling Prep. Built with Ract, Redux, and SCSS.
projects.descriptionPopup: Stock performance is a web application to check out performance by company to see which one performs the best, based on an external API provided by Financial Modeling Prep. Built with Ract, Redux, and SCSS.

projects.name: Multi-Post Stories
projects.description: Experimental content creation feature that allows users to add to an existing story over the course of a day without spamming their friends.
